metadata.title: CVE-2020-21683 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A global buffer overflow in the shade_or_tint_name_after_declare_color ingenpstricks.c of fig2dev 3.2.7b allows attackers to cause a denial ofservice (DOS) via converting a xfig file into pstricks format.

criterions.comment: fig2dev: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
